hole_2.original_tactic:
intro a b c
rw [harea2]
exact
  by
  have h₁ : 0 ≤ (volume (convexHull ℝ ({ a, b, c } : Set (Fin 2 → ℝ)))).toReal := by exact ENNReal.toReal_nonneg
  linarith

hole_4.error_message: Tactic status: Incomplete: contains sorry, goals remain: 0
hole_4.original_tactic:
intro a b c
rw [harea3]
exact
  by
  have h₁ : 0 ≤ (μH[2] (convexHull ℝ ({ a, b, c } : Set (Fin 3 → ℝ)))).toReal := by exact ENNReal.toReal_nonneg
  linarith

hole_9.error_message: Tactic status: Incomplete: contains sorry, goals remain: 0
hole_9.original_tactic:
classical
use fun _ => ![0, 0]
have h₁₁ :
  (∑ i : Fin m,
      ∑ j : Fin m,
        ∑ k : Fin m,
          if (i < j ∧ j < k) then (a i j k * area2 (![0, 0] : Fin 2 → ℝ) (![0, 0] : Fin 2 → ℝ) (![0, 0] : Fin 2 → ℝ))
          else 0) =
    0 :=
  by
  simp [harea2, Real.volume_Icc, Pi.zero_apply] <;> norm_num <;>
          simp_all [Fin.forall_fin_succ, Fin.sum_univ_succ, Fin.sum_univ_zero] <;>
        ring_nf <;>
      norm_num <;>
    linarith
have h₁₂ :
  (∑ i : Fin m,
      ∑ j : Fin m,
        ∑ k : Fin m,
          if (i < j ∧ j < k) then (a i j k * area2 (![0, 0] : Fin 2 → ℝ) (![0, 0] : Fin 2 → ℝ) (![0, 0] : Fin 2 → ℝ))
          else 0) <
    0 :=
  by rw [h₁₁] <;> linarith
exact h₁₂

hole_14.original_tactic: exact Finset.sum_nonneg fun i _ => Finset.sum_nonneg fun j _ => Finset.sum_nonneg fun k _ => by exact h₄ i j k
